sqlMap.statement:
SELECT REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,CRCD,TSDT_SEQNO,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD,TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND,HTCR_SEQNO FROM T07_NBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
CRCD = #crcd#
TICD = #ticd#
TSDT_SEQNO = $tsdt_seqno$

SELECT REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,CRCD,TSDT_SEQNO,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD,TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_NBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
CRCD = #crcd#
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#

SELECT REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,CRCD,TSDT_SEQNO,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD,TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND FROM
T07_NBH_TSDT
T07_NBH_TSDT_UH
T07_NBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
CRCD = #crcd#
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
ORDER BY VALIDATE_IND,REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,TSDT_SEQNO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_NBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
CRCD = #crcd#
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
UPDATE T07_NBH_HTCR SET VALIDATE_IND=#validate_ind# WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey# AND CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$

UPDATE T07_NBH_TSDT SET VALIDATE_IND=#validate_ind#
FINN=#finn#
FIRC=#firc#
RLTP=#rltp#
FICT=#fict#
FINC=#finc#
CATP=#catp#
CTAC=#ctac#
TICD=#ticd#
TSDR=#tsdr#
CRTP=#crtp#
TRCD=#trcd#
TDRC=#tdrc#
TBNM=#tbnm#
TBIT=#tbit#
TBID=#tbid#
TBNT=#tbnt#
TSTP=#tstp#
TSCT=#tsct#
CRPP=#crpp#
CFIN=#cfin#
CFCT=#cfct#
CFIC=#cfic#
TCNM=#tcnm#
TCIT=#tcit#
TCID=#tcid#
TCAT=#tcat#
TCAC=#tcac#
WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey# AND CATI_SEQNO=$cati_seqno$ AND crcd=#crcd# AND TSDT_SEQNO=$tsdt_seqno$

SELECT REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,CRCD,TSDT_SEQNO,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD,TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND FROM
T07_NBH_TSDT
T07_NBH_TSDT_UH
T07_NBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
CRCD = #crcd#
ticd = #ticd#
TSDT_SEQNO = $tsdt_seqno$
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.CATI_SEQNO,A.CRCD,A.TSDT_SEQNO,A.FINN,A.FIRC,A.RLTP,A.FICT,A.FINC,A.CATP,A.CTAC, A.TBNM,A.TBIT,A.TBID,A.TBNT,A.TSTM,A.TICD,A.TSTP,A.TSCT,A.TSDR,A.TDRC,B.CSNM AS PARTY_ID, A.TRCD,A.CRPP,A.CRTP,A.CRAT,A.CFIN,A.CFCT,A.CFIC,TCNM,A.TCIT,A.TCID,A.TCAT,A.TCAC,A.VALIDATE_IND, A.ORGANKEY,A.CURR_CD,A.PARTY_CLASS_CD FROM T07_NBH_TSDT_UH A,T07_NBH_CTIF_UH B,T07_REPORT_UH C WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND A.CATI_SEQNO=B.CATI_SEQNO AND C.REPORTKEY=A.REPORTKEY AND EXISTS(SELECT 'A' FROM T07_RECEIPT T1,T07_MSG_UH T2 WHERE T1.MSGKEY=T2.MSGKEY AND $sysdate$<=50 AND T2.REPORTKEY=A.REPORTKEY)
A.REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
C.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
C.CREATE_ORG=#organKey#
C.CREATE_ORG IN ($organStr$)
A.FINC = #finc#
A.CRCD = #crcd#
A.TICD = #ticd#
A.curr_cd = #curr_cd#
A.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
B.CSNM = #party_id#
A.TSTM >= #tstm:DATE#
A.TSTM < #tstm_end:DATE#
ORDER BY $ordername$
DESC

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORTKEY) FROM T07_NBH_TSDT_UH A,T07_NBH_CTIF_UH B,T07_REPORT_UH C WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND A.CATI_SEQNO=B.CATI_SEQNO AND C.REPORTKEY=A.REPORTKEY AND EXISTS(SELECT 'A' FROM T07_RECEIPT T1,T07_MSG_UH T2 WHERE T1.MSGKEY=T2.MSGKEY AND $sysdate$<=50 AND T2.REPORTKEY=A.REPORTKEY)
A.REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
C.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
C.CREATE_ORG=#organKey#
C.CREATE_ORG IN ($organStr$)
A.FINC = #finc#
A.TICD = #ticd#
A.CRCD = #crcd#
B.CSNM = #party_id#
A.curr_cd = #curr_cd#
A.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
A.TSTM >= #tstm:DATE#
A.TSTM <= #tstm_end:DATE#
